bibl.title: Nekloni (al-Naqlūn) and the Coptic Account Book British Library Or. 13885.
From Bāwīṭ to Marw. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World

bibl.note: Introduction. - al-Naqlūn and the Polish Excavations. - Building G and Manuscript Nd.04.168. - The London Account Book British Library Or. 13885. - An Administrator Restored to His Office. - Conclusions. - ""The isolated Coptic leaf Nd.04.168, discovered in 2004 in well-documented circumstances during scientific excavations in the medieval monastic complex, links the eleventh-century account book British Library Or. 13885 conclusively to the monastery of al-Naqlūn"". - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.8 P. Lond. Inv. Or. 13885 descr. P. Naqlun Inv. Nd.04.168 descr.
Jacques van der Vliet, Nekloni (al-Naqlūn) and the Coptic Account Book British Library Or. 13885.

Andreas Kaplony, Daniel Potthast & Cornelia Römer (edd.), From Bāwīṭ to Marw. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 112 (Leiden - Boston, 2015) pp. 155-169, 2 pll. coul.

Introduction. - al-Naqlūn and the Polish Excavations. - Building G and Manuscript Nd.04.168. - The London Account Book British Library Or. 13885. - An Administrator Restored to His Office. - Conclusions. - ""The isolated Coptic leaf Nd.04.168, discovered in 2004 in well-documented circumstances during scientific excavations in the medieval monastic complex, links the eleventh-century account book British Library Or. 13885 conclusively to the monastery of al-Naqlūn"". - Avec résumé en anglais.
